summary: Implement subscription payment processing with automatic renewal
description:
Users should be able to subscribe to Habitto's premium services with automatic monthly renewal. The system should handle payment processing, failed payments, and subscription management.

Requirements:
- Support for credit card and digital wallet payments
- Automatic monthly renewal processing
- Failed payment retry logic with email notifications
- Subscription cancellation and refund processing
- Payment history and invoice generation

Acceptance Criteria:
- User can enter payment details securely
- System processes payment and confirms subscription
- Failed payments trigger retry attempts with notifications
- Users can cancel subscription with prorated refunds
- Payment history is accessible in user dashboard

Figma Design: https://www.figma.com/file/abc123/payment-flow

comments.body: This feature is critical for Habitto's revenue model and must be PCI compliant.
Need to ensure seamless user experience during payment processing.
